fulltext:
NGUYỄN THANH ĐIỀN
Business Development Manager
 0939636354  thanhdien155@gmail.com
Truong Sa Street, 17 Ward, Binh Thanh
District, Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam
Gender
: Male
Birthday
: 15/05/1988

Nationality
: Vietnamese
Country
: Vietnam
Address
: Truong Sa Street, 17 Ward, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam
PERSONAL PROFILE
Level
: Manager
Salary
: 1.300 - 1.500 USD
Job type
: Full time
Industry
: Agriculture, Food & Beverage (F&B), Sales / Business Development
Location
: Can Tho, Ho Chi Minh - District 1 , International, Japan
CAREER INFORMATION
I am 31 years old, male, single. My hometown is in Can Tho City. I have lived and worked in HCMC for 4 years. Now I
am a Deputy Business Develpment Manager in Vinh Phat Wilmar Rice Company_Wilmar Corporation_Singapore.
I have 9 years working experience, includung 5 years at management positions. I am really
strong at sale, especially sale B2B. I also can do business development activities. I have good
knowledge about Rice, agricultural commodities, feed ingredients and FMCG as well. I have long
time worked at international corporation, so I have profesional behaviours and strong plan,
report skill... I can speak English well and strong field work skill.
With passion for sale/business, I have set target to become a Sale Director and a CEO in next 2 years. To be gotten
this target, I need to work hard; study more skill/knowledge such as finance, management... I have spirit of a
start up person
OBJECTIVES
5/2016 - Now : Deputy Business Development Manager (Rice) - Vinh Phat Wilmar Rice Ltd,
Company_ Wilmar Corporation_Singapore
* From 01-2018 until now (Near 2 years, HEAD OF CONSUMER PACKED RICE_GT CHANNEL OF SOUTH AND CENTRAL OF
VIET NAM) 
- Manage sale/business development activities of consumer packed rice_GT channel of South and Central of Viet
Nam (included 4 regions, 60 distributors, 540 salemans). 
- Build sale strategy/policy, survey market demands, making product costing and price, build monthly promotion
EXPERIENCE
Year(s) of Experience: 9
Current Level: Manager
proggram... 
- Follow up and boost sale result of distributors, customers to get monthly/yearly's company and corporation
target. 
- Field work market at provinces in South and Central of Viet Nam everymonth 
- Follow up marketing and brands activities; development new products activities; others... 
* From 05-2016 - 01-2018 (2 years, FOUNDER AND HEAD OF WHOLESALER, INDUSTRIAL CUSTOMER, B2B, KEY
ACCOUNT HORECA CHANNEL) 
- Build up and main in charge Rice Wholesaler, B2B, Industrial customer, Key accounts, HORECA channel in Ho Chi Minh
City and Southeast provinces (build policy, sale stratergy/plan, price table...) 
- Build up and manage sales activities of sale team (4 salemans) to get sale target of company 
- Main in charge selling for key accounts, especially industrial/noodle factories... 
- Sale volume got: Half of 2016 2,500; 2017 8,400 tons of rice.
6/2015 - 5/2016 : Sale Supervisor (Rice) - ADC Ltd, company
- In charge of selling rice for wholesale, B2B, HORECA channel in Ho Chi Minh City 
- Survey, field work, make customer data, meet potential customers, build customer relatetionship and sell bulk
cargo for them. 
- Negotiage; sign purchasing order/contacts with customer to get sale target. 
- Follow up signed PO, ensure commited cargo be delivered in time and finish payment 
- Update, analyse collect market information (price, trend of rice market; competitors activities...) 
- Survey maket and enforce sale plan and other duties like Manager instruction.
6/2014 - 6/2015 : Purchasing Supervisor (rice bran) - Wilmar Agro Viet Nam Ltd, Company
- In charge of negotiating PO/contact for buying raw rice bran for rice bran oil extraction factories. 
- In charge of factories in 3 provinces in Mekong delta (Can Tho, Kien Giang, An Giang) 
- Follow receiving cargo. In charge of buying cargo as optimal price and volume. 
- Field work to update market information...
1/2012 - 6/2014 : Quality Assurance Supervisor - Wilmar Agro Viet Nam Ltd, Company
- Monitor/supervise quality assurance activities of QC team 
- In charge of follow up quality of cargo which is qualified for dispatching 
- Plan and make the duty roster for all daily/monthly working of team. 
- Propose/consult QA/QC improvement activities
Completion date 9-2017
High School / Equivalent - University of Economics Ho Chi Minh City_import-Export Knowledge
- Have basic knowledge about customs procedure, customs document, import-export form... 
- Apply and conect to rice export activities at company
Completion date 9-2010
Bachelor - Chemistry Bachelor
- Regular form 
- Good result
EDUCATION
Highest Degree Level: Bachelor
Have the spirit of start up person
Strong sale and manage skills
Strengths
CAREER HIGHLIGHTS
Can use English in communication
Be responsibility, willing to learn
Hobbies: Travelling, play football, listening to music, reading, social activities
Good knowledge Rice, Agricultural commodities
Strong sale skill
Good strategy, Good plan/Report Skill
Good field work skills
Good Management Skills
SKILLS
Viet Nam
English
LANGUAGES

Sale director
Wilmar CLV group
REFERENCES
